dialogue: We won a government contract to build a CO2 capture machine, and we need some ideas.
We're only brainstorming here, so remember, there are no "bad ideas."
We could capture the CO2 with a net.
Aren't you going to write that one down?
No, I'm fairly confident I'll remember that suggestion for the rest of my life.
We could attract the CO2 with some sort of food.
Forget it! You're all idiots! I'll just design the stupid machine myself!
